cast.overview: Forced out of their apartment due to dangerous works on a neighboring building, Emad and Rana move into a new flat in the center of Tehran. An incident linked to the previous tenant will dramatically change the young couple’s life.
cast.title: The Salesman

details.biography: Mojtaba Pirzadeh  is an Iranian actor. He holds a bachelor's degree in acting from Soore University. Pirzadeh was nominated for a Hafez Award for his performance in the series Sayeban (2017) and for the Crystal Simorgh Award for Best Supporting Actor at the Fajr Film Festival for his role in the film Toman (2019).
details.name: Mojtaba Pirzadeh
